Title: Danbury Mint Pin Brooch Enamel To Mom With Love Crystal Genuine Pearls PA3
Description: This brand new signed Danbury Mint pin is plated in 24kt gold and features 22 Swarovski crystals and 10 genuine pearls. The back is inscribed with "To Mom with all my love." This is a brand new item without the original tags/packaging but it will be sent in a gift box. Please see photos for further details. It's sure to make a beautiful gift or be a treasured addition to your collection!! Mad Sky Jewelry is thrilled to announce that we have acquired a huge quantity of current designer jewelry and jewelry samples used only for display in New York when the private labels decide which specific styles will be mass produced and branded. Much of this on trend jewelry will be branded in the future and seen in magazines, available for purchase on TV, and in your favorite department stores and the trendiest boutiques.
